omni.physx.cct.OgnCharacterController.description: Activate or deactivate a Character Controller on a Capsule prim

omni.physx.cct.OgnControlsSettings.description: Setup control rebinds and settings for the Character Controller

omni.physx.cct.OgnSpawnCapsule.description: Spawn a Capsule prim with stage-defined up axis to be used with a Character Controller
